text: Aristolochia tuberosa is a species of plant in the family Aristolochiaceae. It is endemic to China. ==References== * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Aristolochia tuberosa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. tuberosa Category:Endemic flora of China Category:Endangered flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Aristolochia tuberosa
